name: E-commerce Website
details: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

name: Mobile Fitness App
details: Created a mobile fitness application to track workouts, set goals, and monitor progress. Integrated with wearable devices for real-time data sync.

name: Data Visualization Dashboard
details: Designed and developed a data visualization dashboard for analyzing business metrics and trends. Included interactive charts and graphs.

name: Chatbot Platform
details: Built a chatbot platform for automating customer support and handling frequently asked questions. Implemented natural language processing for better user interaction.
